![Yaarana](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/h2RM5OthB1M/3.jpg =1580x150)

Yaarana is a 1981 Indian film directed by Rakesh Kumar and starring Amitabh Bachchan, Amjad Khan, Neetu Singh, Tanuja and Kader Khan.

![Shreemaan Aashique](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/KnjROHZ8LT4/3.jpg =1580x150)

Shreemaan Aashique is 1993 Hindi Bollywood Movie Directed by Deepak Anand with Cast Rishi Kapoor, Urmila Matondkar, Bindu, Anupam Kher. The Film is edited and directed by Deepak Anand. A Very Comedy Movie. Must Watch

entry.title: Mr Ya Miss
entry.content:
![Mr Ya Miss](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/LM8fE0kL5e8/hqdefault.jpg =640x380)
![Mr Ya Miss](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/LM8fE0kL5e8/1.jpg =1580x150)
![Mr Ya Miss](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/LM8fE0kL5e8/2.jpg =1580x150)
![Mr Ya Miss](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/LM8fE0kL5e8/3.jpg =1580x150)

Wealthy Gujarati-speaking Sanjay Patel is a self-styled Indian Casanova, who believes in dating and flirting with a wide assortment of young women, and breaking their hearts. He works as an Executive in an Advertisement Firm and is very friendly with a male co-worker, Shekhar, who is exactly Sanjay’s opposite when it comes to females. Sanjay flirtatious actions land him in trouble with three women, Loveleen Kapoor, Seema and Rita, he is attacked and is killed. He appears before Bhagwan Shivji and Devi Maa Parvati and he pleads with them to let him return, he is asked to mend his ways before the next Shivratri, and is permitted to return. The next day Sanjay treats this as a bad dream and sets about his usual way. This does not auger well with Parvati and she recommends to Shivji that Sanjay’s gender be changed to female in order to enable him to understand and appreciate the fairer sex…

entry.title: Hera Pheri
entry.content:
![Hera Pheri](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/MmIW6qu8hHk/maxresdefault.jpg =640x380)
![Hera Pheri](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/MmIW6qu8hHk/1.jpg =1580x150)
![Hera Pheri](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/MmIW6qu8hHk/2.jpg =1580x150)
![Hera Pheri](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/MmIW6qu8hHk/3.jpg =1580x150)

Hera Pheri is a 2000 Hindi comedy film directed by Priyadarshan starring Akshay Kumar, Paresh Rawal, Sunil Shetty and Tabu. The story of the film is based on the 1989 Malayalam film Ramji Rao Speaking, which was also remade into Tamil as Arangetra Velai in the same year. The film spawned a sequel, Phir Hera Pheri, released in 2006. Hera Pheri 4 will succeed Phir Hera Pheri, and is in pre-production.
